channel.title: Blog on Mike Romero's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Mike Romero's Site

item.title: 12 3 2022 Changing Themes
item.description: Introduction It is 23:37, do you know where your kids are? So a few changes as i am customizing this thing. Changed from the default theme - Sorry Hugo folks, it is nice, but hard to customize. Setup For this project, i am using my M1 Macbook Pro with Visual Studio Code. I am deploying this site to GitHub Pages, and have a rudementary pipeline in place that builds using Hugo, the site and publishes to a branch that is published to the GitHub Page.
